title: [1.8-1.9.4] [ssp/smp] [汉化] Whole Tree Axe 砍树斧[HAYO]
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1214150089 于 2016-7-27 23:32 编辑 

简介
这个MOD可以将整个树一下子砍完
（这个是1.8的材质）
（这个是1.8.9-1.9.4的材质）
合成配方↑

下载地址
有能力的支持作者一下吧
1.8-1.9.4↓（1.8.9-1.9.4版本无需翻墙）
1.9.4 Whole Tree Axe
1.9 Whole Tree Axe
1.8.9 Whole Tree Axe
1.8 Whole Tree Axe

下载不了的点这个（只有1.8版本，已汉化）

建议和FastLeafDecay（快速落叶）一起食用，效果更佳哦！
[1.8.9][ssp/smp]快速落叶——FastLeafDecay
[1.8][ssp/smp][搬运]快速落叶——Fast Leave Decay 无需等待苹果落地！

更新日志
updated to 1.9.4
- axe now acts like an actual axe (breaks planks, etc. faster than with hands)
1.2.1:- fixed crash with newer versions of forge
1.2.0: - updated to 1.8
1.1.9: - fixed axe is damaged by 2 per use
1.1.8 - updated to 1.7.10
1.1.7: - updated to 1.7.2
1.1.6: - updated to 1.6.2
1.1.5: - updated to 1.5
1.1.4: - updated to 1.4.6
1.1.3: - updated to 1.4.5
1.1.2: - updated to 1.4.2
1.1.1: - added property to the config file to allow adding blocks to work with the axe - axe now works with harvesting a block instead of right clicking it
1.1.0b: - removed mcmod.info, that caused a crash on forge 230+
1.1.0: - updated to 1.3.2
1.0.8: - updated to 1.2.5
1.0.7: - updated to 1.2.3
1.0.6: - updated to 1.1.0
1.0.5: - updated to 1.0.0
1.0.4: - updated to 1.8.1
1.0.3: - fixed drop birch and spruce wood
1.0.2: - axe now harvests all connecting wood blocks
1.0.1: - fixed config file in SMP not working


给人气呗
3n67





[groupid=128]HAYO Studio[/groupid]

replies.author: 泠
replies.txt_content: 这…………正好我装不了砍树mod，但是连锁矿工也没问题啊……这斧子有何卵用吗？

replies.author: asjkdaskljda
replies.txt_content: 类似于砍树MOD（插件==）恩，不错的想法不过图片挂了

replies.author: J_黑默丁格
replies.txt_content: 砍树插件还能砍完之后自动种植诶。。。

replies.author: 12wqasxz
replies.txt_content: 如果是那种奇形怪状的树就没办法了啊
